title: Count Vowels and Consonants
statement: Given a string S containing only lowercase letters, count the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) and consonants.
input_format: A single line containing string S.
output_format: Print two space-separated integers: count of vowels and count of consonants.
constraints:
1 <= |S| <= 10^5
S contains only lowercase English letters.
